email_text:
Subject: Urgent: Apply for COVID-19 Relief Funds Now!

Dear [Recipient],

As a valued citizen, we understand the financial difficulties you may be facing due to the ongoing pandemic. Our government agency, the Department of Relief and Recovery, is offering relief funds to those who have been impacted by COVID-19.

To access these funds, we kindly ask you to fill out the attached form and submit it to us as soon as possible. This form will allow us to verify your eligibility and process your application swiftly.

We assure you that all information provided on the form will be kept confidential and used only for the purpose of distributing relief funds to those in need.

Please don't hesitate to reach out to us if you have any questions or need assistance with the application process. We are here to support you during these challenging times.

Thank you for your cooperation and stay safe.

Sincerely,

Department of Relief and Recovery

[Attachment: COVID-19 Relief Fund Application Form]
